file_content.text: Now this is what I call service. We step off the shuttle, and the bounty we're here to collect is already waiting. Perfect.
I'm sick of being cooped up on starships, Xo'ru. I want to run around and shoot things for a while.
Easy, Kindin. Greetings, gentlebeing Captain. We are here on behalf of Rogun the Butcher. It seems he'd like a word with you.
I'll be sure to call Rogun sometime. Tell him I said hello.
Thanks for the tip.
I think he'd prefer to chat sooner rather than later. You know how impatient gangsters can be.
You must be Rogun's bounty hunters.
You clearly aren't messengers.
Technically, we work freelance. We were just in the right place at the right time when Rogun placed his bounty on you.
Tell Rogun to get spaced.
I'm not in the mood.
Ooh, a fighter. This might be fun after all.
I'm afraid we're not messengers, my good Captain. If you have any advice for Rogun, you should deliver it yourself--in person.
Please don't make this difficult. We get a substantial bonus if we bring you in alive. Come along quietly.
You guys want a thief named Skavak, not me.
I'm not your real target.
You can explain everything to Rogun when you see him. I'm sure he'll take your story into consideration before passing judgment.
How much would it cost for you to forget you ever saw me?
I can offer you a bonus.
Do you really think you can buy our loyalty? Because you can, of course. It's just a shame you can't outbid Rogun.
We're going to carbon-freeze you now, all right? I promise it won't hurt much, and it really is the safest way to travel.
Sorry, I only travel first class.
I never fly as cargo.
Very well. She's all yours, Kindin.
Very well. He's all yours, Kindin.
It doesn't sound too safe to me. Think I'll pass.
I doubt that.
Well, it's safer than what Kindin wants to do.
You had your chance, morons. Time to die.
You'll die first. [Attack]
Shut up and die, you freaks.
Not a chance, ugly. [Attack]
You really should've surrendered, Captain.
But I'm glad you didn't!
We're not here for you, friend. Move along.
